idea-plugin.name: Deep Focus
idea-plugin.description:
Deep Focus is a theme based on Next Ocean theme.

Theme objectives:
  • Allow the developer to focus on the code.
  • Contrast colors when it's relevant
  • Speed up development using well known Next Ocean base theme


To install:
  • Go to Settings | Plugins, find the theme plugin and install it
  • Restart the IDE
idea-plugin.change-notes:
Initial theme.
Use Next Ocean as base theme Change color to make it darker Remove high contrast
